body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Charles Green from Vincenzo's Benzos. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm interested in purchasing a new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to hear! May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly! My name is Sandra Martinez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sandra. Could you please provide me with the make and model of the vehicle you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a 2023 model of the Benzos SUV.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent choice! Could you also share your preferred color for the vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I would like it in midnight blue.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! Thank you for the information, Sandra. I will get back to you shortly with the availability of the model in your preferred color.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Sandra. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Charles Green and the customer's name is Sandra Martinez.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
